p: In this assay, the microbial suspension was spread onto MHA medium in Petri dishes using a L-shaped spreader. Afterwards, several wells (6 mm in diameter) were created on the medium surface and loaded with the essential oil (20 μL). The Petri dishes were kept at a constant temperature of 37°C for 24 h, and the diameter of the inhibition zones around the wells was measured and expressed in millimeters [ 13].
